name: Web Stories Experience Playbook_Design_Kit_V1
description: Welcome to the Web Stories Experience Playbook_Design_Kit_V1. In this file you will find all the resources to create your own Web Stories entry points. You can customize the elements in this document to fit your own brand and web guidelines, following the recommendations of the playbook provided below. View the full playbook at http://goo.gle/Web-Stories-Playbook. Want to know more about Web Stories? Check out stories.google and amp.dev/stories for more details.
